Proprietary Laboratory Analyses (PLA) Codes

Source: R/standards.R
search_plas.Rd

U codes

https://www.ama-assn.org/practice-management/cpt/cpt-pla-codes

Usage

search_plas(hcpcs_code = NULL, ...)

Arguments

hcpcs_code

<chr> vector of 5-character HCPCS codes

...

These dots are for future extensions and must be empty.

Value

a tibble

See also

Other HIPAA Standards: search_descriptions(), search_hcpcs(), search_modifiers(), search_pos(), search_rbcs()

Examples

search_plas()
#> # A tibble: 337 × 9
#>    hcpcs_code desc_long      desc_medium desc_short date_released date_effective
